0.3.16.en:
Support light (issue #519)
Add attributes vattenfallBannerDiscountCode, thresholdModeActive, mountingStateWithError, isAirComfortEligible
0.3.16.de:
Unterstützungslicht (Gewebe #519)
Attribute hinzufügen vattenfallBannerDiscountCode, SchwellwertModeActive, mountStateWithError, isAirComfortEligible
0.3.16.ru:
Световая поддержка (выдача #519)
Добавить атрибуты vattenfallBannerDiscountCode, порогModeActive, MountStateWithError, isAirComfortEligible
0.3.16.pt:
Luz de apoio (edição #519)
Adicionar atributos vattenfallBannerDiscountCode, limiarModeActive, mountingStateWithError, isAirComfortEligible
0.3.16.nl:
Vertaling:
Adresteert vattenfallBannerDiscountCode, drempelModeActive, mountingStateWithrror, isAirComfortEligible
0.3.16.fr:
Lumière de soutien (issue #519)
Ajouter les attributs vattenfallBannerDiscountCode, thresholdModeActive, montageStateAvecError, isAirComfortEligible
0.3.16.it:
Luce di supporto (problema #519)
Aggiungi attributi vattenfallBannerDiscountCode, sogliaModeActive, montaggioStateWithError, èAirComfortEleggibile
0.3.16.es:
Soporte de luz (sue #519)
Añadir atributos vattenfallBannerDiscountCode, thresholdModeActive, mountingStateWithError, isAirComfortEligible
0.3.16.pl:
Wsparcie światła (odcinek #519)
Add attributes vattenfallBannerDiscountCode, thresholdModeActive, mountingStateWithError is AirComfortE zrozumiałe
0.3.16.zh-cn:
(第519号)
添加的属性是《濒危的BannerDis de Code》,阈化行为,不断增长的WithError,是AirComfortEligableable

0.3.16-alpha.0.en:
Support light
Support vattenfallBannerDiscountCode, thresholdModeActive, mountingStateWithError, isAirComfortEligible
0.3.16-alpha.0.de:
Unterstützungslicht
Unterstützung vattenfallBannerDiscountCode, SchwellwertModeActive, MontageStateWithError, isAirComfortEligible
0.3.16-alpha.0.ru:
Поддержка света
Поддержка vattenfallBannerDiscountCode, порогModeActive, MountStateWithError, isAirComfortEligible
0.3.16-alpha.0.pt:
Luz de suporte
Suporte vattenfallBannerDiscountCode, limiarModeActive, mountingStateWithError, isAirComfortEligible
0.3.16-alpha.0.fr:
Support lumière
Support vattenfallBannerDiscountCode, thresholdModeActive, montageStateAvecError, isAirComfortEligible
0.3.16-alpha.0.it:
Luce di sostegno
Supporto vattenfallBannerDiscountCode, sogliaModeActive, montaggioStateWithError, èAirComfortEleggibile
0.3.16-alpha.0.es:
Soporte ligero
Soporte vattenfallBannerDiscountCode, thresholdModeActive, mountingStateWithError, isAirComfortEligible
0.3.16-alpha.0.pl:
Światło pomocowe
Wsparcie vattenfallBannerDiscountCode, thresholdModeActive, mountingStateWithError, isAirComfortE zrozumiałe
0.3.16-alpha.0.zh-cn:
支助
支持被遗弃的Banner Dis de Code,阈化,不断增长的WithError,是AirComfortEligableable

0.3.15.en:
move to jsonConfig.json (Admin 5)
Support steering of ActivateOpenWindow, OpenWindowDetection, childLockEnabled 
Bump iobroker-jsonexplorer to v0.1.9
js-controller 4.0 readiness

Verschieben Sie zu jsonConfig.json (Admin 5)
Unterstützt die Steuerung von ActivateOpenWindow, OpenWindowDetection, childLockEnabled
